string.name: app_label
string.description: Label shown on the system app launcher. Note: Health Connect is the brand. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: permissions_and_data_header
string.description: Header for section listing actions for showing connected apps permissions and data screens [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: home_subtitle
string.description: Description on the home screen of the app. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Review and manage the health and fitness data on your phone, and control which apps can access it

string.name: data_title
string.description: Label for a button that takes the user to the data management screens. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: all_categories_title
string.description: Title of a screen that lists all health data categories. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: see_all_categories
string.description: Label for a button that takes the user to the all categories screens. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: no_data
string.description: Label that is displayed when the given health data category does not have any data.

string.name: data_subtitle
string.description: Description for a button that takes the user to the data management screens. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: See your data and recent app activity

string.name: connected_apps_title
string.description: Label for a button that takes the user to the connected apps' permissions screens. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: connected_apps_subtitle
string.description: Description for a button that takes the user to the connected apps' permissions screens. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: recent_access_header
string.description: Header for section showing apps that have recently accessed health data [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: no_recent_access
string.description: Header for section showing apps that have recently accessed health data [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: No apps recently accessed Health Connect

string.name: see_all_recent_access
string.description: Header for section showing apps that have recently accessed health data [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: recent_access_screen_description
string.description: Description of Recent access screen, placed at the top. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: See which apps have accessed your data in the past 24 hours

string.name: today_header
string.description: Header in the list of data access entries to differentiate between entries from today and yesterday. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: yesterday_header
string.description: Header in the list of data access entries to differentiate between entries from today and yesterday. [CHAR LIMIT=50]

string.name: activity_category
string.description: Title for activity category, displaying user data related to activities (such as active time, calories burned, etc.) [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: body_measurements_category
string.description: Title for body measurements category, displaying user data related to body measurements (such as height, weight, etc.) [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: sleep_category
string.description: Title for sleep category, displaying user data related to sleep (such as sleep duration, bedtime schedule, etc.) [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: vitals_category
string.description: Title for vitals category, displaying user data related to vitals (such as heart rate, blood pressure, etc.) [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: cycle_tracking_category
string.description: Title for cycle tracking category, displaying user data related to cycle tracking (such as cervical mucus, menstrual flow, etc.) [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: nutrition_category
string.description: Title for nutrition category, displaying user data related to nutrition (such as calories consumed, hydration, etc.) [CHAR LIMIT=30]

string.name: browse_data_category
string.description: Label for a section that contains user data grouped by categories. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: manage_data_section
string.description: Label for a section that has different user actions like deleting data. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: export_data_button
string.description: Label for a button that allows a user to export their data. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: delete_all_data_button
string.description: Label for a button that allows deleting all data points. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: no_categories
string.description: Label that shows when health connect does not have data. Note: Health Connect is the brand. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: You don\'t have any data in Health Connect

string.name: permission_types_title
string.description: Title of screen for a user to manage their health and fitness data [CHAR_LIMIT=40]

string.name: app_priority_button
string.description: Label for a button that opens the app priority settings screen where users can set which app should have higher priority. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: delete_category_data_button
string.description: Label for a button that allows deleting all data points from a given health data category. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: can_read
string.description: Section title that refers to apps with read permission for given permission type. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: can_write
string.description: Section title that refers to apps with write permission for given permission type. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: inactive_apps
string.description: Section title that refers to apps that are inactive in Health Connect. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: inactive_apps_message
string.description: Description of the inactive apps section. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: These apps can no longer write %s, but still have data stored in Health Connect

string.name: data_access_empty_message
string.description: Message shown if there is no app to display on this page [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Apps can no longer read or write %1$s and there is no %2$s data stored in Health Connect

string.name: data_access_exercise_description
string.description: Description of data access for the exercise data type [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: This data includes information like active time, exercise type, laps, repetitions, sessions, or swimming strokes

string.name: data_access_sleep_description
string.description: Description of data access for the sleep data type [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: This data includes information like sleep stages and sleep sessions

string.name: all_entries_button
string.description: Label for a button that opens the Data entries page. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: delete_permission_type_data_button
string.description: Label for a button that allows deleting all data points from a given health permission type. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: range_after_x_months
string.description: Item in a list of possible time ranges for auto-deletion. Choosing this will automatically delete data older than x months. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.description: Item in a list of possible time ranges for auto-deletion. Choosing this will never delete data automatically. [CHAR_LIMIT=50]

string.name: auto_delete_rationale
string.description: Footer note explaining that after changing auto-delete settings, corresponding data will be deleted. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: When you change these settings, Health Connect deletes existing data to reflect your new preferences
